title: The Client
description: After having a wild sexual encounter, Stephanie and Raymond grew close. They flirt and tease each other all day. But when Raymond sends Stephanie to Jacob for some work, she finds herself strangely attracted to this man who wears his emotions on his sleeve. Coming back from Jacob, Stehpanie could not take him out of her head and when he has sex with Raymond, Jacob invades her fantasy. It puts Stephanie in a dilemma -- she is torn apart between an emotional and sensitive Jacob and a wild and suave Raymond.
author: Michele M. Oneal
